name: Arlo
description:
Dance with Demons, Dodge to Survive


Survival in Arlo isn't about overpowering adversaries; it's about swift movement and evasion. The arena brims with danger as enemies rush, creating fleeting gaps and opportunities. Constant movement is vital - evade assaults, dart through openings, and maneuver strategically to survive.

Speed and precision are your allies. Deftly dodge and collect experience, aiming and leveling up to enhance your capabilities. In this unforgiving arena, power means little without agility. Your fate rests on your movements, your dodges. Survive, adapt, and outmaneuver the encroaching darkness. This is not just a battle; it's a dance for survival.

Lacking damages ?

Take some risks and get closer !

Your damage multiplier increase by close dodges

Features:

  • 27 weapons with 11 unique attack.
  • More than 70 equipment with different base stats.
  • 6 passive attacks to support you.
  • Your decisions determines the pace of your journey. Are you willing to take the risks for a quicker run?

Enter the arena, aim with precision, dodge with agility, and defy your demons. Survival demands not just strength but accuracy and finesse.
